contract_details.description: Implement advanced monitoring and analytics platform to provide comprehensive visibility into swarm operations, performance metrics, and system health.
contract_details.background: Current monitoring capabilities need enhancement to provide real-time insights, predictive analytics, and comprehensive system observability.
objectives: Implement comprehensive system monitoring and observability
Create advanced analytics and reporting dashboards
Establish predictive monitoring and alerting systems
Develop performance metrics collection and analysis
Implement distributed tracing and dependency mapping
Create automated incident detection and response
deliverables: Comprehensive monitoring platform with real-time dashboards
Advanced analytics system with predictive capabilities
Automated alerting and incident response system
Performance metrics collection and analysis framework
technical_requirements: Time series databases and analytics tools
success_criteria: Distributed tracing maps all system dependencies
Automated incident response reduces MTTR by 50%+

dependencies: Data storage and processing capabilities available
resources_required: Time series databases and analytics tools
